configSync.title: Sync Strategy Management
configSync.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this sync strategy?
configSync.syncDescriptionText: Configure data sync strategies with support for full sync, incremental sync, and real-time sync modes. You can set Cron expressions for scheduled sync.

form.incrementalFieldRequired: Incremental sync requires specifying an incremental field
form.scheduleExtra: Cron expression, leave empty for manual trigger. e.g., 0 2 * * * (daily at 2 AM)

configDB.title: Database Configuration
configDB.securityTipDescription: It is recommended to use a read-only database account for data extraction. Passwords will be encrypted and displayed with masking.
